<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ebb and Flow](/Feats.aspx?ID=1706) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Metamagic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=107" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 123 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Versatile Font](/Feats.aspx?ID=275)

</column>

---

You can pull forth both positive and negative energy simultaneously to harm your enemies and heal your allies. If your next action is to cast a 1-action or 2-action [_heal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=148) or [_harm_](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) spell, choose one creature in range that would be harmed by the spell, and choose another creature within range that would be healed by the spell. Your _heal_ or _harm_ targets both creatures.
name: Ebb and Flow
